name: Ghost Sniper
description:
Ghost Sniper is a 2D high score based sniper game where player will fight against terrorists and save civilians in various maps. Player will level up as they progress through the game. Player needs to upgrade their skills and use power ups to get better score.

Note :- The game is still in early development stage so there will be some bugs and issues.
